<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Selects a unit from player's group. If player is the leader, the effect of this command is similar to player pressing F1, F2, F3... buttons to highlight units in his squad, after which the unit command menu is shown. If leader is AI, player will get usual communication menu to interact with the leader.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> player '''groupSelectUnit''' [unit, select]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> player: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [unit, select]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> select: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> After leaving menu, deselect all units (command menu is not opened -> no selection)<code>{
    [[player]] [[groupSelectUnit]] [_x, [[false]]];
} [[forEach]] ([[groupSelectedUnits]] [[player]]);</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Select all units when player is the leader:<code>{
    [[player]] [[groupSelectUnit]] [_x, [[true]]];
} [[forEach]] [[units]] [[player]];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Open communication with group leader:<code>[[player]] [[groupSelectUnit]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[leader]] [[player]], [[true]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[groupSelectedUnits]]
</value></part></template>
